Information of the 2st class transfer:
If you want to make a class transfer, find the Race Master in the Village of Gludio.
2st class transfer available after reaching 38 level.
For Fighter: Warrior Guild For Mystic: Einhasad Template
For Elven Fighter: Warrior Guild For Elven Mystic: Einhasad Template
Dark Elven's: Dark Elven Guild
Orc's: Orc Guild
Kamael: Kamael Guild
Dwarven's: Blacksmith
